Good Comments: Color-coding is nice, but subs miss parts of some lines, TL fewer signs than Funi, and misunderstand some manga concepts, like Kaede/Fuuka/Fumika being in the Walking Club.
Good Subs, and Text Effects. Bad thing is they take FOREVER to sub the episodes.
Best choice, if you don't need English audio. It's the only finished version with actual subs and typesetting.
Bad Comments: Excellent typesetting, and no complaints that I can think of.
Great translations and good word timings... although they're taking forever on the last 2 episodes!!
I can't even watch it, as I can't find a way to download it
I know it is licensed, but what is taking so long... we have to wait MONTHS before the "new" episodes come out... Other than that, I have no complaints or comments. No offense.
The only sane option with not localized/burgerized subs.
